content:
The army of the Russian Federation attacked the village of Novogrodivka, Donetsk region, as a result of the shelling is dead, two more people were injured.

About thisreportedHead of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin.

“At least 1 person was killed and 2 injured as a result of shelling. The Russians fired at the city today around 3:30 pm - it is now known about 1 killed man in 1963, ”he said.

According to the head of Ova, two women were injured, they were taken to the hospital.

Vadim Filashkin also added that a search and rescue operation is currently under the scene.

As reported by the Armyinform, Missile Attack on Nikolaev: the number of victimsincreasedto the sixth.
title: As a result of the shelling of Novogrodivka, a man was killed: search and rescue operation is ongoing
description: This was reported by the head of Donetsk Ova Vadim Filashkin. “At least 1 person died ...
author: Army Inform
